content: All cetaceans (whales, dolphins, and porpoises), all sirenians (manatees and dugongs) and several marine carnivores (seals, otters, walrus, and polar bears) are protected under the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES).
translations: ita:Tutti i cetacei (balene, delfini e focene), tutti i sireni (lamantini e dugonghi) e diversi carnivori marini (foche, lon
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
